questions.quote: Are you kidding? I lie every second of the day. My whole life is a sham!
Well, your day's getting more interesting already.  Ah, see, told me they'd be back in a minute and THEY lied.
I can tell you this. If I am not in front of my house at six-fifteen, when my parents get there, they will put me on an aggravation installment plan that will compound with interest for decades.
: I didn,t tell you to park in that lot .. Now someone's gonna have to drive you every time you need your car.? Take the bus!
Kramer, I don't wanna stop and talk with everyone, every time I go in the building. I just wanna nod and be on my way.

No he's not going to take it off. If he was going to go over there bald, I never would have introduced him.
